main.name: Paul Wang
main.description: Hello, This is an old website of mine where I got to tinker around with deployment pipelines and AWS. The website's contents are outdated but feel free to download my resume
main.bio: Having been a dev for many years, I took a break and am now looking to transition into something new. I built this website during my university years as an excuse to gain understanding of AWS, but it ended up costing nothing to host so I decided to keep it around. I used Netlify for hosting and automatic deployment of the connected GitHub repo. The backend is hosted via a free AWS subscription, using lambda functions for the logic and DynamoDB for database. Feel free to check out the code on the linked Github account.

work.title: Technical Analyst
work.description: Currently working as a software developer for Teck Coal, developing and providing support for an array of Drilling and Blasting applications using C# .NET and C++.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Worked as a junior developer on application level C++ software for embedded GPS/communication devices. Also gained experience with CI/CD via Jenkins and automated GoogleTest/Python tests.

work.title: Interactive Web Developer
work.description: Worked with teachers, gathering requirements to develop learning tools/javascript web-apps to aid their respective online Moodle courses.

work.title: Junior Java Developer
work.description: Worked on the portal team as a summer student, relevant technologies - Java/SAP UI5.
